mean_en: a game played on a large field by two teams of nine players who try to score runs by hitting a small ball with a bat and then running to each of the four bases without being put out
word_etyma: base(棒球）垒+ ball球 → baseball 棒球
sentence: One player hits the baseball that was thrown by another player.
sentence_trans: 一名球员击中了由另一名球员投来的棒球。
